DRG.deleteDiagnosis ( $  diag_nr = 0  ) 

"Deletes" a diagnosis code record entry. The entry is not actually deleted from the table but its status is set to "deleted".

Parameters:
int Diagnosis code record entry number
Returns:
boolean

DRG.DeptQuicklist ( $  type = '',
$  dept_nr = 0 
)

Returns the quicklist code items of a department. The record count is stored in the rec_count variable and can be fetched via the LastRecordCount().

$  step = 1 
)
